meta.description: Get in touch for AI architecture reviews, advisory, and delivery engagements. Available for enterprise AI platform design and technical leadership.

intro: Best via the contact form below or LinkedIn. I'm open to advisory, architecture reviews, and select delivery engagements focused on enterprise AI platforms.

cta.text1: I work with organizations building enterprise AI solutions that require robust architecture, security-first design, and scalable implementation.
cta.text2: Currently focusing on LLM platform development, prompt engineering at scale, and AI governance frameworks.
